introText.heading: Welcome to WindsockUI
introText.text: WindsockUI is an incredible framework allowing front-end developers to integrate content management into their apps. The components themselves become editable meaning that editing components is 100% intuitive. Be sure to try the framework out. It's highly likely that you totally love it!
